teamMembers.name: Stewart
teamMembers.bio: Licensed since 2016 with certification from Lion's Barber Collective. Stewart founded Black Cat Barber in 2020 with a vision of creating an elevated barbershop experience. Specializes in both classic and modern styles with precision clipper and scissor work.
teamMembers.availability: Booking 2 weeks ahead; new appointments available Sundays

teamMembers.name: Tiphany
teamMembers.bio: Cutting hair since 2011, Tiphany brings a decade of experience in traditional straight razor barber services. She works with all hair textures and lengths, creating both short and long masculine shapes with precision and care.

teamMembers.name: Iyaunna
teamMembers.bio: A versatile stylist specializing in Invisible Bead Extensions (IBE), color and balayage techniques, and both masculine and feminine cuts. Iyaunna brings creative energy and technical expertise to every service.

teamMembers.name: Ashley
teamMembers.bio: Specializing in blonding and customized color services, Ashley creates beautiful dimensional color and layered haircuts. She also provides professional men's cuts with attention to detail and style.

teamMembers.name: Raul
teamMembers.bio: Newly licensed barber bringing fresh energy and modern techniques. Specializes in fades, textured masculine styles, beard trims, and straight razor work. Available for both walk-ins and appointments.
